children.name:
`cy.request()` failed on:

https://conduit-api.bondaracademy.com/api/users/login

The response we received from your web server was:

  > 403: Forbidden

This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.

If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: POST
URL: https://conduit-api.bondaracademy.com/api/users/login
Headers: {
  "Connection": "keep-alive",
  "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/137.0.0.0 Safari/537.36",
  "accept": "*/*",
  "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate",
  "content-type": "application/json",
  "content-length": 65
}
Body: {"user":{"email":"randomemail@gmail.com","password":"123456aA!"}}

-----------------------------------------------------------

The response we got was:

Status: 403 - Forbidden
Headers: {
  "x-powered-by": "Express",
  "vary": "Origin",
  "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8",
  "etag": "W/\"2f-83PWxEwXkLR3WfVjo3wqB0FwKlU\"",
  "x-cloud-trace-context": "88aa33eb1e581943340c21a9148df1c0",
  "date": "Fri, 06 Jun 2025 10:12:58 GMT",
  "server": "Google Frontend",
  "content-length": "47"
}
Body: {
  "errors": {
    "email or password": [
      "is invalid"
    ]
  }
}


https://on.cypress.io/request
